channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Okay well my problem is I dont know how to change what the message of the week is on the screen where you would click, "click here to play". I'm using davidscape source (bulby base) and I realize I need to change something in the frames.java I'm just not sure what! Thanks for any suggestions!
Well anyways theres an image of what I'm trying to change.
[img]http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss114/sig00/Message-1.png[/img]

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

try opening your client folder and searching the folder VIA searchbar. try typing “message of the week” no " 's

Read full topic
